meanings: heighten the pride of the Korean people

vlive.korean: 배우로서의 자긍심과 긍지를 갖고... I have the pride for being an actor... 듣기 View video V Special : [REPLAY] 2016 대한민국 대중문화 예술상 시상식
vlive.english: I have the pride for being an actor...

vlive.korean: ['이상민'이라는 상호는 긍지와 자부심이 생기는] 긍지도 좀 있죠. [The shop's name, "Lee Sang Min, fills him with pride] It makes me proud, too. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [간판스타]이상민 vs 이상민 vs 이상민
vlive.english: [The shop's name, "Lee Sang Min, fills him with pride] It makes me proud, too.

examples.korean: I take (a) pride in my work. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 내 일에 긍지를 갖고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I take (a) pride in my work. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Dignity and pride run deep in this community. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 공동체에서는 긍지와 자부심이 깊다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Dignity and pride run deep in this community. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I take a great deal of pride in my work and am committed to producing the highest quality work I can. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 전 제가 한 일에 높은 긍지를 가지며 최고의 결과를 얻고자 노력합니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I take a great deal of pride in my work and am committed to producing the highest quality work I can. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Pride does not consort well with poverty. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 긍지는 가난과 잘 어울리지 않는다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Pride does not consort well with poverty. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He takes pride in his work. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자기 일에 긍지를 가지고 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: He takes pride in his work. Add to Wordbook
